site_name: Wilkie House Cureton StreetLondonSW1P 4EH
description: Window repairs and decorations, roof repairs and new loft insulation, replacement of spalled brickwork/brickwork repairs and repointing to isolated areas, repairs and localised replacement of RWG and SVP's, external and internal decorations to all previously painted areas, redecoration of existing main entrance door, provision of new communal flooring (carpet), replacement of non compliant front entrance doors, FRA works - compartmentation, signage, communal cupboard doors, new lateral mains and door entry system including new containment, and provision of new fire detection system (Linked to 20/06746/LBC)
